incidents.name: [EU][Dedicated Servers] - Reboot issue
incidents.message: Start time : 26/10/2023 10:22 UTC End time : 26/10/2023 12:15 UTC Service Impacted : Most of our Baremetal servers have experienced problems with disk boot or rescue. - UEFI machines: could not reboot either to disk or to rescue - Legacy BIOS machines: could not reboot to rescue-customer Root cause : The incident is due to a misconfiguration in our IPLB infrastructure. Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

incidents.name: [Scheduled] [GLOBAL][NAS HA] - NFSv4.1 support maintenance
incidents.message: Start time : 10/10/2023 04:30 UTC End time : 12/10/2023 05:00 UTC Service impact : During the maintenance, a restart of the server-side NFS daemon will be made. So a service interruption of less than a second may be observed Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to make NFSv4.1 automatically supported by default on all SSD-based NAS-HA over the current NFSv3.
